channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senators eye more budget bill cuts despite House speaker’s plea for few changes
item.description: The biggest hurdle in the Senate for Trump’s tax and immigration bill could come — like it did in the House — from deficit hawks who demand more cuts.

item.title: Trump says he will delay tariffs on European Union until July 9
item.description: Trump said that he and the Europeans intend to “rapidly get together and see if we can work something out.”

item.title: The ‘Big Beautiful Bill’ is a big risk for House Republicans. Many of them hope otherwise.
item.description: As the 2026 midterms loom, voters are restless and eager to penalize those in power. Every election starting with 2006, with the exception of 2012, ha...

item.title: Veterans recoil at Trump plan to end Afghans’ deportation protection
item.description: The Trump administration claims conditions in Afghanistan have markedly improved under Taliban rule. Those who fought in the war say that’s ‘laughable...

item.title: Steve Scalise leads outside the glare of the House speakership
item.description: The House majority leader, having come back from a shooting and a cancer bout, has shifted into the role of GOP elder statesman after having once soug...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
